name: Beast Fort
description:
An adventurer sneaks into an old castle for treasure ...
The story begins there.

Being struck by a demon beast in an old castle, he falls asleep deeply.

When I woke up, my soul and body were separated.

If you do not defeat the demon beast and remove the curse, the power of the soul will weaken and will eventually disappear.

Time is limited, hurry up.
Fight to survive! Adventurer.

========================================

・ 5 types of big animation

・ 17 types of mini animation

・ 8 basic illustrations
